item.title: European Union won't allow attacks on borders, French minister says after Trump's Greenland comments
item.description: In an interview on Wednesday, Jean-Noël Barrot addressed the U.S. President-elect's interest in Greenland.

item.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman denies sexual abuse allegations made by his sister in lawsuit
item.description: In a lawsuit filed in Missouri, Sam Altman's sister has accused the OpenAI CEO of years of sexual abuse. Altman denied the claims.

item.title: Wildfires rage in Los Angeles, forcing tens of thousands to flee
item.description: A growing wildfire raged across an upscale section of Los Angeles on Tuesday, destroying numerous buildings and creating traffic jams as people evacua...

item.title: Stock futures slip as investors struggle to recover from tech-driven sell-off: Live updates
item.description: Stocks sold off in Tuesday’s regular session, spurred by profit-taking in Big Tech names and worries about the Federal Reserve’s rate cuts.

item.title: European markets turn lower as euro zone economic sentiment declines
item.description: European markets turned lower Wednesday as investors assessed the region's economic outlook.
